original_title: A Ticket for Everyone: Busted Live
overview: The Busted Live DVD A Ticket For Everyone follows the Live CD album of the same name, and features concert footage of all the band's hits from their previous 2 million-selling studio albums Busted & A Present For Everyone. Recorded live from the Manchester leg of their arena tour earlier this year, the on-stage footage is accompanied by, amongst others, bonus material including a band documentary, screensavers and videos to several of Busted's biggest hits. Includes the live version of current single, "She Wants To Be Me".
tagline: Filmed at The Manchester Evening News Arena
title: A Ticket for Everyone: Busted Live
